body.title: Apple is removing Parler from the App Store
body.description: Apple has removed Parler from the App Store. Apple follows Google in removing the app, which is known for being conservative-friendly and having less stringent moderation than other social media platforms.
body.content:
Google removed the app from the Play Store Friday evening
